alert.note: Alert for Izard; Searcy; Stone; Van Buren (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 3:29AM CST until February 16 at 4:15AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Stone County in north central Arkansas... East central Searcy County in north central Arkansas... Southwestern Izard County in north central Arkansas... Northeastern Van Buren County in north central Arkansas... * Until 415 AM CST. * At 329 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Thola to near Elba to near Rocky Hill, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mountain View... Thola... Herpel... Elba... Old Lexington... Brandenberg... Blanchard Springs Campground... Guion... Allison... Alco... Hanover... Rushing... Turkey Creek... Fifty-Six... Flag... Arlberg... Fox... Onia... Timbo... Twin Creek... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
